overview:
UKTradeStreet is an online marketplace that brings together consumers, builders and tradesmen.

Posting a job on the site is free for consumers and householders. Tradesmen pay a small fee to quote for a job.

Working on a principle of recommendations through feedback, tradesmen are rated on their workmanship by those who hire them, making it easier to find high quality builders and for builders to find good quality jobs.

Try us, you will be surprised at how easy the site is to use.
